answers.answer: I was 1lb 10oz they said at 24 weeks. Im now 26 weeks. My next appt is next week. I cant wait to see where she is at! Im hoping she slows down a bit lol
I had a scan last Wednesday and I was told baby was weighing 2.5lbs @ 27wks. Was told that was perfect. Am worried about having a big baby cause I have diabetes but Alls good according to the docs.

question: Hi moms. How much did your baby measured in weight at around 27weeks ultrasound? Went yesterday and our boy measured 1.25kg (2.77pounds) already. Dr said its a nice big boy.
title: 27week weight
